name: TNECSED
description:
Teppup fell in a dark, dark cave! Help him exit !

controls: wasd or arrow keys, space, escape to pause

some lore: 

November, 22nd, Thursday:

school: mat test

After school, Paul come at my home we played Backgamon and some video games, Paul brought his favorite game. I forgot the title. It is about pets. We also played at "the mother and the father", but we needed a child. We used his doll. He takes it everywhere why his doll like this? He calls it "teppup" he says that he it is "special"... but it is just weird, with its color and its sharp thing. It was fun to play with him. 

November, 23rd, Friday:

Paul did not come at school. Nobody noes why. Maybe he is sick?

November, 24th, Saturday:

Why people don't answer my questions!? I asked tons of questions, but they ignored me, or talk nonsense. They said he's gone, but when I ask where he is, or when he'll come back, they look at me strange. 

Sunday:

Wednesday:

November 29th, Friday:

school: mat test 19/20

He will not come. I'll let him where he is. Maybe he'll be happier. I throw Teppup into a cave.
